roleset.name: respond automatically (or automatedly), like a robot

example.name: concatenated rel
example.text: I just get voicemail when I call and a robo - response when I email directing me to a way out - of - date , highly uninformative website .

propbank.arg: directing me to a way out - of - date , highly uninformative website

example.name: arg0, not concatenated
example.text: Hannaford tried to proffer Wakefield 's ( and Polly Tommey 's ) comments , but they only sent their lawyers ' roboresponse ( Wakefield did not fabricate data , there is such a thing as autistic enterocolitis , yada yada ) .

roleset.note: ROBORESPONSE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from roboresponse.01-n)
